headline: MNST Q1 Earnings Call: Lower Sales on Distribution Impacts, Margin Expansion from Pricing and Supply Chain
summary: Energy drink company Monster Beverage (NASDAQ:MNST) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales falling 2.3% year on year to $1.85 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.47 per share was 2.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Coca-Cola, Monster Beverage, Keurig Dr Pepper, Primo Brands and Zevia
summary: KO, MNST, KDP, PRMB, and ZVIA ride health and digital trends as innovation offsets cost headwinds in soft drinks.

headline: 1 Nasdaq 100 Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 to Ignore
summary: The Nasdaq 100 (^NDX) is home to some of the biggest success stories in tech and growth investing. However, certain stocks in the index face challenges like profitability concerns, rising costs, or shifts in market trends.
